Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ControllerGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ControllerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class ControllerGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
ControllerGame controls the first phases of the game when players are logging in, and coordinates model and view. ControllerGame observes View and update when View receives message from player.

      public ControllerGame()

  • Method Details

    • getState

      public GameStartingState getState()

    • resetControllerGame

      public void resetControllerGame()
      When all players disconnected, ControllerGame is reset to the initial configuration.

    • getMaxNumPlayers

      public int getMaxNumPlayers()
      Returns:
      the chosen number of players, or @return 0 if is not yet been chosen.

    • getCurrentNumPlayers

      public int getCurrentNumPlayers()
      Returns:
      how many players are connected at this moment.

    • addView

      public void addView​(View view) throws FullGameException
      Parameters:
      view - is a new view tries to connect to ControllerGame.
      Throws:
      FullGameException - if Game has fulled its number of players. add @param view to views, and if player has already chose his nickName, create a new player.

    • removeView

      public void removeView​(View view, java.lang.String nickName)
      Parameters:
      view - is the view of disconnecting player.
      nickName - is the nickName of the player. delete player from Game and from views, and if there are no remaining views, reset ControllerGame.

    • quitGame

      public void quitGame​(View view, java.lang.String nickName)
      Parameters:
      view - is the view of disconnecting player.
      nickName - is the nickName of the player. if player disconnect before game started, only informs other player. Instead, if player has already started, informs player to disconnect.

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      Specified by:
      update in interface java.util.Observer
      Parameters:
      o - is one view observed by ControllerGame.
      arg - is one message from player. updates when player send one message to Server. If game is already started, firstly valuates if its effectively player's turn, and then proceeds to handle his request.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(View view, java.lang.String nickName)
      Parameters:
      view - is player's view trying to logging in.
      nickName - is player's chosen nickName.

    • newGame

      public void newGame​(Message numPlayerMessage) throws WrongParametersException, IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      numPlayerMessage - is a message of NUM_PLAYERS.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong number of players.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases. creates a new GameManager and a new TurnController of @param numPlayers and adds the first player to game.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      rearranges views like players in game. Then informs player that all players connected and tells them their position.

    • sendNickNames

      public void sendNickNames​(int player, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nickNames)
      Parameters:
      player - is one player.
      nickNames - are players nickNames. sends to each players an ordered list of nickNames of other player.

    • sendLeaderCards

      public void sendLeaderCards​(int player, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards)
      Parameters:
      player - is one player.
      leaderCards - are 4 casual leaderCards. sends to each player 4 different casual leaderCards.

    • isMyTurn

      public void isMyTurn​(Message m)
      Parameters:
      m - is one TURN message. answers player with a new TURN message specifying if it's his turn or not.

    • playersReady

      public void playersReady()
      sends to all players that each one of them have made all choices. Now game could start.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      activates the end game procedure.

    • leaderCardHandler

      public void leaderCardHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a message with player's choices about which LeaderCards chose.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong leader cards.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.

    • oneResourceHandle

      public void oneResourceHandle​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      message - is message with player's chosen first resource.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases or if this message has been sent by the first or fourth player.

    • twoResourceHandle

      public void twoResourceHandle​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      message - is message with player's chosen first two resource.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases or if this message has been sent by the first, second or third player.

    • buyCardHandler

      public void buyCardHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException, ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException, InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      message - is a BUY_CARD message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong deck card.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException - if player has chosen an empty deck.
      ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException - if player can't add chosen card to his slots.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.

    • choseSlot

      public void choseSlot​(int currentPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> slots)
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - is the player that have the turn.
      slots - are a list of available slots.

    • chosenSlotHandler

      public void chosenSlotHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException, ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException, InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      message - is a CHOSEN_SLOT message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong card slot.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException - if player has chosen an empty deck.
      ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException - if player can't add chosen card to his slots.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.

    • takeMarbleHandler

      public void takeMarbleHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a TAKE_MARBLE message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong market row or column.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.

    • useMarbleHandler

      public void useMarbleHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a USE_MARBLE message
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong number of players.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.

    • choseWhiteConversionCard

      public void choseWhiteConversionCard​(int currentPlayer, LeaderCard[] leaderCards)
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - is the player that have the turn.
      leaderCards - are @param current player active white conversion cards.

    • whiteConversionCardHandler

      public void whiteConversionCardHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a WHITE_CONVERSION_CARD message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong number of players.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.

    • switchHandler

      public void switchHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, ImpossibleSwitchDepotException
      Parameters:
      message - is a SWITCH message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong depots.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      ImpossibleSwitchDepotException - if switch is not possible.

    • developmentCardPowerHandler

      public void developmentCardPowerHandler​(Message message) throws IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException, InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      message - is a DEVELOPMENT_CARD_POWER message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong development card.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.

    • basicPowerHandler

      public void basicPowerHandler​(Message message) throws InsufficientResourceException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a BASIC_POWER message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong basic power.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.

    • leaderCardPowerHandler

      public void leaderCardPowerHandler​(Message message) throws InsufficientResourceException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a LEADER_CARD_POWER message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong leader card.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.

    • endProductionHandler

      public void endProductionHandler​(Message m) throws IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      m - is a END_PRODUCTION message.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.

    • leaderActivationHandler

      public void leaderActivationHandler​(Message message) throws InsufficientResourceException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, ActiveLeaderCardException, InsufficientCardsException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a LEADER_CARD_ACTIVATION message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong leader card.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if player previously discarded leader card.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if player previously activated leader card.
      InsufficientCardsException - if player has not enough cards.

    • leaderDiscardHandler

      public void leaderDiscardHandler​(Message message) throws ActiveLeaderCardException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, IllegalStateException, WrongParametersException
      Parameters:
      message - is a LEADER_CARD_DISCARD message.
      Throws:
      WrongParametersException - if player has chosen a wrong leader card.
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases.
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if player previously discarded leader card.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if player previously activated leader card.

    • endTurnHandler

      public void endTurnHandler() throws IllegalStateException
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player has send this message during a wrong phases. if game is ended, proceeds to end game procedure, otherwise go to the next turn.
